text: Eyh Carter. Thanks for you answering. Basically I just want to grab the details of new contacts that signed up. Then so some stuff with those details and tell the workflow cool, I got what I needed and to move to the next step. At some intervals I might want to force a step from my side into a certain branch.
I sorted the issue. Thank you again <@U01QVR44MEY>. Now the contact gets both associations, Primary and School Champion, when it runs through the workflow.

Hi all, we have aircall integrated with our HS CRM and we are able to create a tasks for our Sales team when we receive an SMS. However, is it possible to log the SMS as an activity via a workflow instead of a task?
